trans-unit.source: Keyword Reference

seg-source.mrk: Keyword Reference

target.mrk: Keyword Reference

trans-unit.source: Contains scroll bar parameters to be set by the $SBM_SETSCROLLINFO message, or retrieved by the $SBM_GETSCROLLINFO message

seg-source.mrk: Contains scroll bar parameters to be set by the $SBM_SETSCROLLINFO message, or retrieved by the $SBM_GETSCROLLINFO message

target.mrk: Contains scroll bar parameters to be set by the $SBM_SETSCROLLINFO message, or retrieved by the $SBM_GETSCROLLINFO message

trans-unit.source: Parameters

seg-source.mrk: Parameters

target.mrk: Parameters

trans-unit.source: Specifies the size, in bytes, of this structure. The caller must set this to DllStructGetSize($tagSCROLLINFO).

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the size, in bytes, of this structure.
The caller must set this to DllStructGetSize($tagSCROLLINFO).

target.mrk: Specifies the size, in bytes, of this structure.
The caller must set this to DllStructGetSize($tagSCROLLINFO).

trans-unit.source: Specifies the scroll bar parameters to set or retrieve. This member can be a combination of the following values:

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the scroll bar parameters to set or retrieve.
This member can be a combination of the following values:

target.mrk: Specifies the scroll bar parameters to set or retrieve.
This member can be a combination of the following values:

trans-unit.source: $SIF_ALL - Combination of $SIF_PAGE, $SIF_POS, $SIF_RANGE, and $SIF_TRACKPOS.

seg-source.mrk: $SIF_ALL - Combination of $SIF_PAGE, $SIF_POS, $SIF_RANGE, and $SIF_TRACKPOS.

target.mrk: $SIF_ALL - Combination of $SIF_PAGE, $SIF_POS, $SIF_RANGE, and $SIF_TRACKPOS.

trans-unit.source: $SIF_DISABLENOSCROLL - This value is used only when setting a scroll bar's parameters.

seg-source.mrk: $SIF_DISABLENOSCROLL - This value is used only when setting a scroll bar's parameters.

target.mrk: $SIF_DISABLENOSCROLL - This value is used only when setting a scroll bar's parameters.

trans-unit.source: If the scroll bar's new parameters make the scroll bar unnecessary, disable the scroll bar instead of removing it.

seg-source.mrk: If the scroll bar's new parameters make the scroll bar unnecessary, disable the scroll bar instead of removing it.

target.mrk: If the scroll bar's new parameters make the scroll bar unnecessary, disable the scroll bar instead of removing it.

trans-unit.source: $SIF_PAGE - The nPage member contains the page size for a proportional scroll bar.

seg-source.mrk: $SIF_PAGE - The nPage member contains the page size for a proportional scroll bar.

target.mrk: $SIF_PAGE - The nPage member contains the page size for a proportional scroll bar.

trans-unit.source: $SIF_POS - The nPos member contains the scroll box position, which is not updated while the user drags the scroll box.

seg-source.mrk: $SIF_POS - The nPos member contains the scroll box position, which is not updated while the user drags the scroll box.

target.mrk: $SIF_POS - The nPos member contains the scroll box position, which is not updated while the user drags the scroll box.

trans-unit.source: $SIF_RANGE - The nMin and nMax members contain the minimum and maximum values for the scrolling range.

seg-source.mrk: $SIF_RANGE - The nMin and nMax members contain the minimum and maximum values for the scrolling range.

target.mrk: $SIF_RANGE - The nMin and nMax members contain the minimum and maximum values for the scrolling range.

trans-unit.source: $SIF_TRACKPOS - The nTrackPos member contains the current position of the scroll box while the user is dragging it.

seg-source.mrk: $SIF_TRACKPOS - The nTrackPos member contains the current position of the scroll box while the user is dragging it.

target.mrk: $SIF_TRACKPOS - The nTrackPos member contains the current position of the scroll box while the user is dragging it.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the minimum scrolling position.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the minimum scrolling position.

target.mrk: Specifies the minimum scrolling position.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum scrolling position.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the maximum scrolling position.

target.mrk: Specifies the maximum scrolling position.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the page size. A scroll bar uses this value to determine the appropriate size of the proportional scroll box.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the page size.
A scroll bar uses this value to determine the appropriate size of the proportional scroll box.

target.mrk: Specifies the page size.
A scroll bar uses this value to determine the appropriate size of the proportional scroll box.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the position of the scroll box.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the position of the scroll box.

target.mrk: Specifies the position of the scroll box.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the immediate position of a scroll box that the user is dragging.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the immediate position of a scroll box that the user is dragging.

target.mrk: Specifies the immediate position of a scroll box that the user is dragging.

trans-unit.source: An application can retrieve this value while processing the $SB_THUMBTRACK request code.

seg-source.mrk: An application can retrieve this value while processing the $SB_THUMBTRACK request code.

target.mrk: An application can retrieve this value while processing the $SB_THUMBTRACK request code.

trans-unit.source: An application cannot set the immediate scroll position, the SetScrollInfo function ignores this member.

seg-source.mrk: An application cannot set the immediate scroll position, the SetScrollInfo function ignores this member.

target.mrk: An application cannot set the immediate scroll position, the SetScrollInfo function ignores this member.

trans-unit.source: Remarks

seg-source.mrk: Remarks

target.mrk: Remarks

trans-unit.source: $SIF_xxxxx and $SB_XXX for scrollbar require #include <ScrollbarsConstants.au3>

seg-source.mrk: $SIF_xxxxx and $SB_XXX for scrollbar require #include <ScrollbarsConstants.au3>

target.mrk: $SIF_xxxxx and $SB_XXX for scrollbar require #include <ScrollbarsConstants.au3>
